data.title: About: Sandra Goldbacher
data.meta_description: Sandra A. Goldbacher (born 1960) is a British film director, TV director, and screenwriter.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Sandra Goldbacher, née en 1960 à Londres, est une réalisatrice et productrice britannique. (fr)

Sandra A. Goldbacher (born 1960) is a British film director, TV director, and screenwriter. (en)

Sandra Goldbacher é uma cineasta e Produtora britânica. Ela dirigiu comerciais para The Observer, Philips, , Wella, Johnnie Walker e Baileys. Ela também dirigiu documentários para a série Building Sights da BBC e dois documentários para o Channel Four. (pt)

Sandra Goldbacher (ur. w 1960 w Londynie) – brytyjska reżyserka i scenarzystka pochodzenia żydowskiego.Absolwentka University of Sussex (literatura francuska) oraz rocznego kursu filmowego i wideo na Middlesex University. (pl)

桑德拉·A·戈尔德拜彻（Sandra A. Goldbacher 1960年－）是一名英国电影、电视导演和编剧。 (zh)
